summary: Completed comprehensive testing of KOSMAN boarding house management application. Backend APIs working perfectly with 100% success rate. Frontend UI functional with excellent navigation and CRUD operations. Critical business logic flows (contract auto-creates bills, room status updates, payment creates transactions) all working correctly.

ui_bugs.issue: Custom select dropdown components have minor interaction issues with automated testing
ui_bugs.impact: Does not affect manual user interaction, only automated testing

passed_tests: Dashboard stats display (kamar terisi, tagihan belum bayar, pemasukan bulan ini, laporan kerusakan)
Navigation to all pages (Rooms, Tenants, Contracts, Bills, Maintenance, Transactions)
Room CRUD operations with validation (unique room numbers)
Contract creation with business logic (auto-creates bills, updates room status)
Contract ending (updates room status back to kosong)
Maintenance report creation (sets room status to perbaikan)
Maintenance completion with cost (creates expense transactions)
